name: Catch a Peach In Space
description:
My first attempt at game development. This was made within couple months in unity. In the future I plan on remastering the whole game to feature more robust gameplay and features like other planets and a way to use peaches.

All assets are made by me in blender or Procreate.

Musics: Surreal sippin' by Turbo, Stellar Slurping by Turbo. 

Sound effects from Zapsplat.com
